name: Ultimate Member Jogging Platform
author: RogierLankhorst, willemvanderveen

sections.description:
Ultimate member social jogging platform is an extension of the Ultimate member plugin. The plugin has a range of features which are attractive to joggers and can increase the traffic on your website. The extended functionality of this plugin doesn’t interfere with the current existing features of Ultimate member and are completely optional for your users.

Features

  • This plugin adds one additional tab to the user page and a leaderboards page
  • The users can track their jogging progress with this plugin
  • The leaderboard page stimulates competition and best performances are shown here
  • The users are rewarded for their participation on the platform with points and various badges
  • Progress can be easily visualized in graphs where data can be examined
  • Users can get a personalized advice which is based on scientific fundaments
sections.installation:
1. Install this plugin
  2. Install ultimate member plugin
  3. Activate the ultimate member plugin
  4. Activate this plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install this plugin
  2. Install ultimate member plugin
  3. Activate the ultimate member plugin
  4. Activate this plugin

screenshots.caption: The plugin adds another tab to the user page with four additional subtabs
On the jogging profile various statistics and badges are displayed
In the progress section the results of various runs can be compared
In the advice a user can request a personalized advice
